subsections.title: AI Pioneers
subsections.summary: An overview of the early contributors who laid the foundation for artificial intelligence.

subsections.title: Alan Turing
subsections.summary: The life and contributions of Alan Turing, including his work on the Turing test and computational theory.

subsections.title: John McCarthy
subsections.summary: A detailed look at John McCarthy's role in developing LISP and his contributions to AI theory.

subsections.title: Marvin Minsky
subsections.summary: Exploring the contributions of Marvin Minsky, co-founder of the MIT AI Lab and pioneer in robotics.
